description: Electronic Health Records system unresponsive in Emergency Department. Clinicians unable to access patient histories. Reverting to paper.
Lab results interface failing to transmit critical values to nursing stations. Delay in abnormal result notifications.
Patient portal showing incorrect appointment times after daylight saving time change. Multiple patients arriving at wrong times.
HIPAA audit log showing gaps in access tracking. 6-hour window of unlogged activity on radiology system.
Medication dispensing cabinets in ICU reporting connectivity issues. Nurses using override codes for urgent medications.
Telehealth platform video quality degraded. Providers reporting pixelated video and audio dropouts during consultations.
Billing system rejecting Medicare claims with new 2024 codes. 450 claims pending manual review.
Surgical scheduling system double-booked OR-3 for tomorrow. Two cardiac procedures scheduled at same time.
Blood bank inventory system not syncing with regional donation centers. Current stock levels may be inaccurate.
Ransomware indicators detected on imaging workstation. Machine isolated. Potential lateral movement being investigated.
